description: A filter using a single value against a column. Values within the values list have an OR relationship

columnName.description: name of the column to filter

operator.description: Determines the filter operation to perform
operator.name: ColumnSingleValueFilterOperator

enum.name: LIKE
enum.description: The LIKE operation. Use wildcard '%' in value string for prefix/suffix matching.

values.description: Values to used with the filter. Multiple values will be joined in an OR relationship.
